name: Goblin Island
description:
The player was born on a Goblin island. By killing Goblin mobs and bosses to earn gold coins and magic balls, and constantly improves your basic attributes and weapons to defeat the final island boss.

Game features:

1. 4 kinds of unique weapons. 
Spear: good at medium distance straight attack;
Hammer: good at close range attack;
Crossbow: good at long-range continuous attack; 
Boomerang: good at penetration attack, you need to pay attention to your position at all times.
2. Rich weather system. Day and night will affect the monster's behavior, and be particularly careful of thunderstorm weather, because the thunder will cause damage to the player.Always pay attention to the temperature in the game. Excessively high temperature will greatly reduce the speed of recovery of energy.
3. The vivid frame-by-frame animation style is pleasing to the eye.
4. Extremely challenging boss.
5. Rich achievements and collection system.
6. Dozens of props to help players quickly upgrade.
